title: Tapestry, 14th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal wrapped linen
Technique: lampas (two interconnected twills)
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (A): 26.7 x 20 cm (10 1/2 x 7 7/8 in.)
Warp x Weft (B): 9.5 x 16.8 cm (3 3/4 x 6 5/8 in.)
description: Large palmette with parts of addorsed birds in blue and tan.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tapestry, 14th century.
14th century. Medium: silk, metal wrapped linen
Technique: lampas (two interconnected twills). Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-242-a,b.
